meanings.sent1: The ancient ritual sacralizes the temple.
meanings.sent2: The community sacralizes the annual ceremony.
meanings.sent3: The cat sacralizes its favorite sleeping spot by purring loudly there.
meanings.sent4: Her presence in the room sacralizes the atmosphere, filling it with peace.
meanings.sent5: The setting sun sacralizes the horizon with its golden light.

meanings.definition: To treat with reverence or respect
meanings.sent1: He sacralizes the family heirloom by displaying it prominently.
meanings.sent2: The students sacralize their teacher by listening attentively in class.
meanings.sent3: The dog sacralizes its favorite toy by carrying it everywhere.
meanings.sent4: The old tree sacralizes the forest, standing tall and wise.
meanings.sent5: The wise elder sacralizes the ancient traditions with his storytelling.
